pr_title: Allow keystore add to handle multiple settings

timeline.message:
Allow keystore add to handle multiple settings

Today the keystore add command can only handle adding a single
setting/value pair in a single invocation. This incurs the startup costs
of the JVM many times, which in some environments can be expensive. This
commit teaches the add keystore command to accept adding multiple
settings in a single invocation.

timeline.bodyText: Would it be worth updating the equivalent text in RemoveSettingKeyStoreCommand? It still talks about removing "a setting" from the keystore, but it already supports multiple settings.
timeline.author: pugnascotia

replies.bodyText: I will handle this in a follow up.
